original_text: Let such an one think this, that, such as we are in word by letters when we are absent, such will we be also in deed when we are present.
korean_text: 이런 사람은 우리가 떠나 있을 때에 편지들로 말하는 것과 함께 있을 때에 행하는 일이 같은 것임을 알지라

sentences.original_text: Let such an one think this
that, such as we are in word by letters
sentences.korean_translation: 즉, 우리가 편지로 말하는 바와 같이

sentences.original_text: such will we be also in deed
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같이 우리 또한 행동으로도 그러하리라
